summary: Retextured the default Reikling into something more adaptive to their surroundings
descriptionHtml:
Although this is not quite lore friendly in the fact that Reiklings are infact a deep blue colour, I did not like the look of them as since Dawnguard, the vanilla Falmer I know and play as sometimes does not fit in as well as I personally like to.

Especially as I was playing as a Snow Elf guy and decided to join the Thirsk Reikling Tribe, having a blue smurf posse hang-ten with me with my Falmer bretheren felt a bit... odd.

So I opened uo the .bsa archives, opened up the retexturer and did this with some retexturing of the eyes also so that they are more Snow elf-ish.

It is nothing special, just a retexture.
author: Beth
